changeComputeType.description: Whether WorkSpaces directory users can change the compute type (bundle) for their workspace. Default `false`.

increaseVolumeSize.description: Whether WorkSpaces directory users can increase the volume size of the drives on their workspace. Default `false`.

rebuildWorkspace.description: Whether WorkSpaces directory users can rebuild the operating system of a workspace to its original state. Default `false`.

restartWorkspace.description: Whether WorkSpaces directory users can restart their workspace. Default `true`.

switchRunningMode.description: Whether WorkSpaces directory users can switch the running mode of their workspace. Default `false`.
